column1: ##Project Description=6 RNA samples need SMARTER prep for RNASeq.  Have already been run on BA.  Send qubit concentrations to Tomas.  Needs to be run on 1x75. 20M per sample.  No analysis needed ==== runs: 1of1: ca_ne_496_004: QC_PASSED (Padma: data dispatched on 10/22/2018)
##Analysis Notes=No analys run ccbbmap for practise
